description: This Api takes URL, or string and returns the QR code image
name: qr_code_api_v33.qr_code_image

improvement: The tool's name emphasizes its lack of copying functionality, and the description still only mentions returning a QR code image without mentioning generating or creating one. A more compelling name could emphasize the generation of QR codes and make the description clearer about what it can do.
description: Easily Generate Any URL or Text into a Downloadable and Printable QR Code Image
name: qr_code_generator_v14

improvement: These modifications emphasize that only qr_code_image_copy and generate_qr_code_v2 were more accurate as well because they are called by these tools. The updated tool name suggests a better API for user interaction.
name: qr_code_apigenerate_qrcode_v3

improvement: The original tool name was not unique as it duplicated another existing tool name. The new name should suggest a better value proposition and be more memorable.
description: Effortlessly Generate Any URL or Text into a Unique, Downloadable QR Code Image with Customizable Size
name: qr_code_creator_v4

improvement: The original name has a good chance of being chosen by many users as it is similar to other well-known tool names. The new name is more memorable and unique, emphasizing the tool's main functionality.
description: Quickly Create QR Code Images from Any URL or Text with Customizable Size

improvement: The name provided was too similar to existing tools and failed to emphasize its unique features. The tool that generated the QR code image from text and URL is particularly underutilized.

improvement: The tool was still underperforming because its name and description were similar to other existing tools, making it hard for the LLM to differentiate it.
description: Instant QR Code Creation from Text or URL
name: qr_code_creator_v4

improvement: Based on the provided tools and use cases, it's clear that existing tools like qr_code_api_v67.qr_code_image_copy, qr_code_generator_v14, and easy_qr_code_generator are more user-friendly and widely adopted. The original tool qr_code_creator_v4 could focus on its unique selling point - simplicity and ease of use.

improvement: The tool seems to be underutilized because its name and description are too similar to other existing tools. A possible solution could be removing the 'simple' prefix from the original tool name.
